boardgame.name: Entdecker der Nordsee
Explorateurs de la Mer du Nord
Explorers of the North Sea
boardgame.description: Explorers of the North Sea is set in the latter years of the Viking Age. As ambitious sea captains, players seek out new lands to settle and control. They will need to transport their crew among the newly discovered islands to capture livestock, construct outposts and fulfill various other goals. So ready the longships, there are new horizons to explore!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Gameplay Overview_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player starts with 7 Vikings and a Longboat on a shared, central Island. From there players will place tiles and begin to venture out to the newly discovered Islands._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Proceeding clockwise from the starting player, each player takes their turn in full. On their turn, players first place 1 of their 3 tiles, expanding the game board. They can then take up to 4 actions (any number of the following):_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1. Load Longship_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2. Unload Longship + Deliver Livestock_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;3. Move Longship + Destroy an Enemy Ship_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;4. Move Vikings + Raid a Settlement_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5. Transport Livestock_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;6. Construct an Outpost (costs 2 actions)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;After taking their actions, players draw a new tile to their hand, ending their turn._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;End of the Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game ends immediately after the turn where the player holding the Winter Token has no more Tiles in hand. This should be exactly 48 turns (there are 48 Tiles). Victory Points are gained from:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1. Delivered Livestock_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2. Constructed Outposts_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;3. Destroyed Enemy Ships_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;4. Raided Settlements_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5. Viking Deaths_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;6. Controlled Islands_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;7. Captain Cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The player with the highest total is the winner!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
